amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Cold storage plants; construction; cost; tax; bonds.
amendatorysection.para: The cost of such utilities may be defrayed by the levy of a tax of not to exceed three and five-tenths cents on each one hundred dollars upon the taxable value of the taxable property within the corporate limits of such city or village in any one year for a cold storage or refrigeration plant or, when such tax is insufficient for the purpose, by the issuance of bonds of the municipality.
